p: A cross-sectional study was conducted in 16 Chinese cities (Beijing, Tianjin, Changchun, Harbin, Shanghai, Nanjing, Hangzhou, Wuhan, Guangzhou, Shenzhen, Nanning, Chengdu, Chongqing, Kunming, Xiâ€™an, and Wulumuqi) from July to September 2015. Fig 1 contains a flow diagram depicting the study design.
